messages.content:
Categorize this IT Ticket:

search results show wrong scores search results show wrong scores dear can you please raise ticket for issue below assigned kind regards engineer sent friday re search results show wrong scores hi statement app when you change values scale for consequences or likelihood risks already inserted recalculated updated still have old value db true here why if you look history for almost any level was registered before st you there entry shows consequences score was changed for when updated set consequences scale default scale for level risks risks have similar history entries dated was set consequences scales default for their levels did manually change scores risks these times have conclude process configuring scale for any level clearly results score being re calculated recorded such change why think search risks output calculating score real consequences cost recorded old consequences scale for level or have another explanation kind regards sent re search results show wrong scores hi after investigation have some updates share with you when you search search value for score wrong but when you open tab then have correct score happening because when you search value taken db but when you open some tab then score recalculated have correct score app when you change values scale for consequences or likelihood risks already inserted recalculated updated still have old value db currently investigating how risks have wrong score looking for solution how update them if missed something feel free correct kind regards engineer sent thursday re search results show wrong scores thanks sent re search results show wrong scores hi already start work if have some updates let you know kind regards engineer sent thursday search results show wrong scores hi have noticed search results showing cases wrong score think score shown too high cases wondering whether because search results using wrong consequences scale derive consequences tier value current consequences cost value you ll recall have added versions consequences scales for each configured default for each level with their consequences scales reflects through into report form even help text for consequences automatically updated into dashboard views but seems consequences scales being used by search risks results table how much effort you think might be fix best regards

**Determining Ticket's Category**

I'm now zeroing in on the best category for this ticket, and after a deeper dive into the system issue, I'm leaning heavily towards "Internal Project," assuming the scoring system is an in-house application. "Miscellaneous" remains a possibility if it isn't, but the more precise context favors the former. I am re-assessing my initial considerations, now focused on making a more informed decision.


**Refining Category Selection**

I'm now fully committed to the "Miscellaneous" category. Analyzing the ticket content, and considering its various facets, I'm confident that it doesn't align with the other specific options. The "Miscellaneous" category best captures the general nature of this functional discrepancy.
